Package com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger

Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
The central class is the (PosTagger).
It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NonDeterministicPosTagger
    A non-deterministic pos tagger, which analyses multiple tokenising possibilities for this sentence, and returns multiple postagging possibilities.
    PosTag
    A part of speech tag, representing a certain morpho-syntaxic category for a word.
    PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading tokenized and tagged sentences from a corpus.
    PosTagComparator
    An interface for comparing two pos-tagged corpora, one of which is considered a reference.
    PosTagEvaluationObserver
    An interface that observes a pos-tagger evaluation while its occurring.
    PosTaggedToken
    A token with a postag tagged onto it.
    PosTagger
    The PosTagger's task is to add part-of-speech tags to words within a sentence.
    PosTaggerEvaluator
    An interface for evaluating a given pos tagger.
    PosTaggerService
    Interface for retrieving implementations of various pos-tagger interfaces.
    PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader
    A corpus reader that expects one pos-tagged token per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex supplied during construction.
    The regex needs to contain the following two capturing groups, indicated by the following strings:
    %TOKEN%: the token - note that we assume CoNLL formatting (with underscores for spaces and for empty tokens).
    PosTagSequence
    A sequence of postags applied to a given token sequence.
    PosTagSequenceProcessor
    Any class that can process pos-tag sequences generated by the pos-tagger or by manual annotation.
    PosTagSet
    A tag set to be used for pos tagging.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PosTagEvaluationFScoreCalculator
    Calculates the f-score of a pos-tag evaluation.
    PosTagEvaluationLexicalCoverageTester
    An observer for testing lexicon coverage of the corpus.
    PosTagEvaluationSentenceWriter
    Writes each sentence to a CSV file as it gets parsed, along with the guesses made and their probability.
    PosTaggedTokenLeftToRightComparator
    Compares PosTaggedTokens, ordering them from left-to-right within a sentence.
    PosTaggerGuessTemplateWriter
    Simply a wrapper for the FreemarkerTemplateWriter, writing the best guess using a freemarker template.
    PosTaggerServiceLocator
    Entry point for this package, through which a PosTaggerService can be retrieved.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PosTagOpenClassIndicator
    An enum to indicate whether a PosTag is an open class, a closed class, or an open class which only accepts entries outside of the lexicon.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnknownPosTagException
    Thrown when the posTag requested does not exist in this pos tag set.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger Description

Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
The central class is the (PosTagger).
It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
